sentence.Network_en: The attribute of the hexagram is devotion; its image is the earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个卦的属性是“奉献”, 它的表现形式是“地球”.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from hexa- 'six' + Greek gramma 'line'

means.word_mean: 1. a regular polygon formed by extending each of the sides of a regular hexagon to form two equilateral triangles

auth_sentence.content: In this second-century BCE text, Hexagram XXX, or Li, contains the following lines: Yang in Top Place The King Goes to war.
